html:
2.11.18  10:54 am   new vid tues?

     yes

2.11.18  10:40 am   i feel like smoking weed gives me a burst of energy and confidence while creating music but it also makes my focus and concentration worse. have you experienced this?

     ah, sounds like you don't have your professional practices and procedures in place. until then, at least keep a whiled and crazy journal

2.11.18  6:23 am   do you have any hidden easter eggs in your videos, or are your videos easter eggs on their own?

     there are some other hidden things besides easter eggs

2.11.18  4:55 am   will you ever have a gun in one of your videos

     i think there was guns in history of japan. maybe also in history of the entire world, that video has almost everything

2.11.18  4:15 am   how long have you been so productive?

     at least 4 years

2.11.18  2:33 am   Why is your 'Lyrics' page such a different background color from the other pages?

     the color scheme on the lyrics page is supposed to be as obnoxious as possible to disuade you from sitting there and reading the lyrics without listening to the music

2.11.18  2:28 am   Are there positive sayings involving hills?

     sure

2.11.18  12:34 am   What is up?

     away from the ground

     Is up a concept?

     sure

2.11.18  12:20 am   your music come from yor head or somewhere?

     yes

2.11.18  12:14 am   I remember you mentioned a software where you put all your ideas in it, and when you need an idea, the software will help you choose one and you won't feel guilty about choosing the wrong project to work on. Where can I download such software?

     just use the website random dot org. tell it how many things you have and it will pick one. to write the things down, use any program that allows you to write things down. every computer comes with a program like that

2.10.18  11:55 pm   Why is life, life?

     most things are themselves

2.10.18  11:20 pm   whats your opinion on the human race?

     sounds like something that could really take off

2.10.18  11:16 pm   how to be creative and come out with a great question?

     look around you

2.10.18  10:53 pm   Don't forget to like comment and subscribe!

     oh thanks i almost forgot!

2.10.18  10:53 pm   what's your opinion on sharpies?

     they are helpful, and useful

2.10.18  9:55 pm   do you love this job

     it is crazy some times but yes

2.10.18  9:26 pm   Is the things I like genuine?

     yes

      Do other people like genuine things?

     sure

     Where do I find these genuine things?

     look around you

2.10.18  9:23 pm   why do people try to be the same when they can be different.

     i don't know

     different is cool

     that's true

2.10.18  8:57 pm   Is anything real?

     yes

2.10.18  8:39 pm   2.8.18  6:06 pm    what's with all of the christian songs, they dont seem very good mr wurtz.

     first prize! entire song list deleted. please don't call me mr. wurtz

2.10.18  8:24 pm   Who is everybody?

     you and me

2.10.18  8:13 pm   Why do people feel the need to ask you why you never use capitals when you use capitals?

     i guess they're not very observant

2.10.18  7:53 pm   can u put ur music on Napster?

     even better

2.10.18  7:35 pm   Floor or ceiling?

     both please

2.10.18  7:19 pm   What is your favorite katy perry tune? 

     parts of wide awake

2.10.18  7:03 pm   What generates time, and where does it come from?

     you

2.10.18  6:54 pm   give me some wisdom

     i am trying

2.10.18  6:07 pm   is there a song in the box?

     which box

2.10.18  5:49 pm   how did you make new canaan sound so pleasant to the ears?

     i took an extra week, and released nguieh instead

2.10.18  5:38 pm   is the new video coming out this tuesday?

     yes

2.10.18  5:05 pm   Fuck the schedule. Do songs if that is what you want to. We can wait.

     i will

2.10.18  4:47 pm   I DONT TAKE ORDERS FROM NOBODY!!!

     oh that's what i should have said for the success thing

2.10.18  4:46 pm   when was the last time?

     there's always more time

2.10.18  4:19 pm   what is "success" to you?

      pony rides, but not on someone else's pony

2.10.18  2:29 pm   How do we know which are the important questions?

     they are all important

2.10.18  2:11 pm   what is the smartest concept ever created, in your opinion?

     thinking

2.10.18  1:59 pm   What's the origin of love?

     the big bang

2.10.18  1:16 pm   What is the question that you are most commonly asked?

     i can't tell you

2.10.18  1:13 pm   Make more videos

     oh darn i didn't even think of that

2.10.18  11:24 am   given the musical relativism you seem to express, do you think today's pop music has as much merit as other music, or less?

     judging music on some sort of merit system is not my idea of a good time

2.10.18  9:50 am   What is your favorite kind of fruit?

     vegetable

2.10.18  9:33 am   do you have any advice for going through life

     sure

     we'll see

     lunch

2.10.18  3:40 am   Do you like hedgehogs?

     they are ok

2.10.18  2:32 am   have you had any epiphanies lately

     yes

2.10.18  1:42 am   do you ever think about hotewig (or any of your videos or accomplishments for that matter) and just think to yourself "wow i actually did that thing"?

     yes, especially that one

2.10.18  12:44 am   how can i overcome artblock? been stuck for a long time now

     think outside the block

2.10.18  12:43 am   could you use a fan as a windmill?​

     sure, with the right attitude

2.10.18  12:14 am   how do you define and/or measure success?

     defining and measuring success is not a sign of success

      in other words how will you know when you are successful? 

     i get a notification on my phone
